title: AGC Team Signup
body:
Hello everyone my name is PredatorZ, Im a Team Manager for AGC

AGC was created mid 2016 and since then the community has expanded immensely. We are now looking for people within and outside of the community who are interested in playing in teams. The teams will consist of players around a similar rank/skill-level.

If you are interested in joining a team you can apply here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdpJDAwwTl2yDxKZOZyppfaor1GzYE3XbMxEUggXDqgm0ayZA/viewform
For more information, any questions or concerns jump on our discord https://discord.gg/2vdFRaT and contact myself, Galaxybear, or Barry Allen

replies.body: Hey, I'm a very good support,check my oce.op.gg if you would like. Add me in game if you are interested
i know im only silver but i will work really hard and def willing to get coached tbh love getting coached and told what to impove on but yea would really love to join
im keen as, top lane main currently gold
